content: Hi Tristan, as many others have noted, this is a great overview. The only thing that didn’t resonate with my experience was at the founding stage. We may have been anomalous because of the product we were building, but the vast majority of our early quantitative questions at RJMetrics were answered with data from our application database. That also may have been a function of the immaturity of event tracking tools 8 years ago. So what you outlined may well be a better path today, but I wanted to share my N=1.
